title: KernelExplainer not thread-safe
body:
```python
from concurrent.futures import ThreadPoolExecutor

import numpy as np
from sklearn.svm import LinearSVC
from shap import KernelExplainer

s = np.random.RandomState(1)
N = 10
x = s.random((200, N))
y = x.sum(axis=1) > (N//2)

svc = LinearSVC()
svc.fit(x, y)

ke = KernelExplainer(svc.decision_function, x[0:5])

print(ke.shap_values(x[0:10]))

with ThreadPoolExecutor(10) as tpe:
    res = list(tpe.map(ke.shap_values, [x[0:10]] * 10))

```


```
  File "/Users/X/.pyenv/versions/flow-venv-3.9/lib/python3.9/site-packages/shap/explainers/_kernel.py", line 190, in shap_values
    explanations.append(self.explain(data, **kwargs))
  File "/Users/X/.pyenv/versions/flow-venv-3.9/lib/python3.9/site-packages/shap/explainers/_kernel.py", line 324, in explain
    self.addsample(instance.x, mask, w)
  File "/Users/X/.pyenv/versions/flow-venv-3.9/lib/python3.9/site-packages/shap/explainers/_kernel.py", line 508, in addsample
    self.kernelWeights[self.nsamplesAdded] = w
IndexError: index 1022 is out of bounds for axis 0 with size 1022
```
